result.name: 2011-present-southern-inshore-fisheries-and-conservation-authority-annual-portland-mussel-surve1
result.notes: Drop down camera footage was used to assess the location of seed mussel beds at the Shambles in the Portland to Studland cSAC. Observations from film footage were used to map beds using MapInfo gis software. This data, DORIS data and historical fishing effort data, were used to define two areas available to the fishery within the cSAC.

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
